ygData.subject: RE: Bard stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: RE: Kizdean Gixx This is the dark elf necro or sk or whatever in West Commons right? I know for a fact that I was able to obtain the note for the Thex Mallet
ygData.messageBody:
RE: Kizdean Gixx

This is the dark elf necro or sk or whatever in West Commons right?

I know for a fact that I was able to obtain the note for the Thex Mallet
quest from him by charming him and then hailing him and giving him the key
phrase. Lament may work for this as well, let us know how it goes.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 2:08 PM
> To: EQ Bards
> Subject: [eqbards] Bard stuff
>
>
> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> Anyone care to comment on my observation that Lament song
> will change the
> faction con? E.g.: I lament a Spectre and it goes from blue
> scowling to
> blue indifferent. I have done this several times. Not being
> a true tester,
> I cant say if it's every time but it was strange enough that
> I took note of
> it more than one time. And walked up to the spectre very
> close to make sure
> there was no reduced agro range. The was 0 agro range and he conned
> indifferent. No, I did not hail him and ask for a quest but
> maybe next time
> I will. And next time I see Kisdean Gixx I am trying this on
> him because I
> know he has a quest.
>
> Next: /auctions Trading one-quarter bub exp for Imbrued Greaves!
>
> Yes, we took a little jaunt to the Plane of Hate. Not too
> long into the
> expedition we dropped a scorn banshee and all of a sudden
> peeps were saying:
> "Gratz Sylly!" "Woo hoo Sylly!" And I am like "uhh what?"
> So they tell me
> to loot it and WOW!!!
>
> Imbrued Platemail Greaves: AC 16, +5 str, +9 sta, +9 agil,
> +10 magic. Wt.
> 5.6. Bard only. magic no drop
>
> http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/pics/latestloot.jpg
>
> And for a peek at one of the PoH mobs we fought:
>
> http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/pics/hatemob_00.jpg
>
> Fun place when the pull goes right. When it dont: train,
> res; train, res;
> train, res. You have lost a Level!
>
> Sylly SongSynger
> Bardette of 48 songs (I was 48 for almost a whole day and
> I'll be 48 again
> so for now I am 48 -.05 bub no biggie ;p)
> <The Pantheon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk...
>
>
>
